title: Getting Started with Simple Logging Facade (SLF4J)
content: Simple Logging Facade for Java (SLF4J) is a logging facade that provides a unified interface for various logging frameworks, such as log4j, java.util.logging, and Logback. It allows for the decoupling of the application code from the underlying logging framework, making it easier to change the logging framework without modifying the application code. Here is a ...
